Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.tiles.piece

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.tiles.piece
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.tiles
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BatteryPiece
    Represents a Battery owned by a PlacedTile that represents a client side BatteryComponent.
    CargoPiece
    Represents a ShipmentType owned by a PlacedTile that represents a client side StorageComponent.
    CrewPiece
    Represents a AlienType owned by a PlacedTile that represents a client side CabinComponent or derivates.
    CrewSetPiece
    Drag and drop piece allowing for the creation of a SetCrewMessage.
    DraggablePiece
    Abstract class representing a piece that may be dragged and dropped on a PlacedTile.
    DraggablePieceDecoder
    Visitor class used to discertain what ServerMessage to generate due to a Drag and Drop event.
    PieceImagePathProvider
    Utility class used to retrieve the paths for the images representing each used piece.
    RemoveComponentPiece
    Drag and drop piece allowing for the creation of a RemoveComponentMessage.
    SelectBlobPiece
    Drag and drop piece allowing for the creation of a SelectBlobMessage.
